program.description: <b>Browser game<br><br></b>Rail Nation combines an in-depth transport simulation with a refines strategy game in charming<br>graphics. As founder of a railroad company the user can turn a sleepy town with historical steam train into a vibrant metropolis with electric railways. It is the players goal to transport as many goods as possible through six historic railroad eras, to interact with other players and to built up their own railroad network. The player has the chance to be the most influential tycoon with the best strategy within the endgame.<br><br><b>User Flow:</b><br>DOI<br>1. The user starts in the www.rail-nation.com<br>home page and clicks on “Register Now”<br>button. After clicking on the button, the<br>system takes him/her to the registration<br>form.<br>2. In the registration form, the user enters a<br>player name, e-mail address and a<br>password. After clicking on the “Register” button, the<br>user is sent an activation e-mail.<br>3. When the user clicks on the link in the<br>activation e-mail, or fills in the activation<br>code on himself, he / she is sent to the<br>website and receives a message that the<br>activation was successful.<br>3.1. The partner tracking pixel is<br>triggered at the moment of<br>activation.<br>The relevant entry can be found in<br>the source code for the HTML<br>page.<b><br><br>Target group:</b><br>- Player type: casual and core games,<br>- Gender distribution: 10% female, 90% male,<br>- Age group: 24-50 years old,<br>- Genre:<br><ul><li>Simulation/strategy</li></ul>- Similar games:<br><ul><li>Forge of Empires,</li><li>Anno Online,</li><li>Trainstation,</li><li>Skyrama,</li><li>The Settlers Online,</li></ul>- Literature &amp; Films:<br><ul><li>Around the world in 80 days,</li><li>The Time Machine,</li><li>Back to the future series,</li><li>The talking of Pelham 1, 2, 3,&nbsp;</li></ul><p><br></p><br>

program.tc:
Keyword Policy Every affiliate who applies for the Bigpoint partner program accepts the following keyword policy. Disregard for this policy will lead to expulsion from the partner program. The presentation of the brand “Bigpoint”, or any kind of word combination thereof, including an incorrect spelling of Bigpoint, is not allowed. The same applies to all Bigpoint games. The usage of the display URL www.bigpoint.com, as well as those for games offered by Bigpoint, is strictly forbidden. This also includes all forms of the display URL which have been altered or modified. In general customers are not to be given the impression through the advertisement or URL display that he/she will be directed immediately to a website that is run by Bigpoint. A direct forwarding (in particular over an affiliate link) from the search results to Bigpoint or to the games is strictly disallowed. There is a negative list of keywords that may not be bid on. Please book these keywords separately as negative keywords (keywords to be excluded), so that these words won’t be shown automatically by the corresponding search network. Negative keywords can be booked for free at the networks. As an alternative option, all reserved keywords can be booked using the option “exact”. If this is done, the booking of negative keywords is no longer mandatory. Bidding on possible word combinations and different forms of spelling is also not allowed.
Negative list: Bigpoint Actionliga FussballManager XBlaster F1Manager Dark Orbit IceFighter Germanys Next Topmodel Mafia1930 Spaceinvasion Gladiatoren Chaoscars Deine11 Parsec Managergames Hockey Gladiatoren 2 The-Pimps Damoria Managergames Soccer Robofighter Land of Destruction Fragoria Seafight Gladius 2 The Mafia Glorykings Starpet PopstarsTheGame Speedcars Farmerama Battlestar Galactica Online Zoomumba War Of Titans Crimejacks Deepolis Hellblades Maestia Warstory Ponyrama Emporea Gangs of Crime Gangs of Crime 1930 Ruined Online Toon Racer BeBees Drakensang Online
Example of bookings which are not allowed: Bigpoint Big point Big-point Bgpont
If campaigns are being run for competitors who are on the negative list, it is forbidden to show Bigpoint games or to link directly to www.bigpoint.com or any of the Bigpoint games on the landing page of the corresponding search request.
